gw.api.bean.compare

Interface Diff<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EntityDiff<T>, PropertyDiff<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiffImpl, EntityDiffImpl, PropertyDiffImpl

    public interface Diff<T>
    Represents the difference or lack thereof between two things: an old thing (the "source" value), and a new thing (the "compare" value). It is normally used to represent difference data that is fed to the user interface. For Policy Refresh, the graph of differences is stored as a tree of gw.api.tree.TreeNode TreeNodes, and each TreeNode stores a Diff as its "data" (accessed through gw.api.tree.TreeNode#getData()).
    Author:
    Dventimiglia

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getCompareValue()
      Returns the new value.
      T getSourceValue()
      Returns the old value.
      boolean hasChanges()
      Whether this diff represents a change to the value or to the value of some child attribute
      boolean hasCompare()
      Boolean bean property indicating whether this diff has a compare value.
      boolean hasSource()
      Boolean bean property indicating whether or not the "source" (i.e., the old value) has been set.
      boolean isAdded()
      Whether this diff represents an item being added
      boolean isRemoved()
      Whether this diff represents an item being removed
